label: obj-alive-set-potential-operator
name: Rescaled Potential Operator for the Alive Set
mathematical_expression: The **Rescaled Potential Operator for the Alive Set**, denoted $V_{\text{op},\mathcal{A}}$, is a deterministic function that maps the raw reward and distance vectors of an alive set of size $k=|\mathcal{A}_t|$ to a vector of fitness potentials for that same set.
